name: goodvetsdupe
description: A full-stack recreation of the GoodVets website, showcasing my ability to replicate designs and implement back-end functionality. Features include responsive front-end (HTML, CSS, JS), a custom back-end with database integration, and API fetching, demonstrating skills in web development, database management, and API handling.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
